scripts.prebuild: mkdirp themes/phila.gov/static/js && mkdirp static/js && cp -R node_modules/phila-standards/dist/fonts static
scripts.build:theme: node-sass --include-path node_modules/font-awesome/scss --include-path node_modules/foundation-sites/scss --include-path node_modules/phila-standards/src/sass --output-style compressed --source-map true themes/phila.gov/static-src/scss/standards.scss themes/phila.gov/static/css/standards.css && browserify themes/phila.gov/static-src/js/standards.js -o themes/phila.gov/static/js/standards.js && cp -R node_modules/phila-standards/src/img themes/phila.gov/static
scripts.build:site: node-sass static-src/scss/style-guide.scss static/css/styles.css && browserify static-src/js/main.js -o static/js/scripts.js
scripts.build: yarn build:site && yarn build:theme && yarn build:app
